title: Technology, Arts and Media Senior Thesis Project
description: Created node.js application to study the use of Queer jargon. Utilized APIs, such as UrbanDictionary, Tumblr, and Flickr, to compare and contrast word definitions with image usages.

parts.title: Homepage
parts.description: Basic homepage features a new word to explore, an explanation of the site and a disclaimer.

parts.title: Browse
parts.description: To explore what's available, a browse page is available.

parts.title: Definition
parts.description: This page features the definition of a word surrounded by example images tagged with the word.
